title: liblink: remove ctxt->linkmode
body:
Unless we are going to force the linkmode to be set during compiler and assembler
invocations, it must be removed from liblink. That is, it cannot be just a linker
setting if it influences code generation. 

CL 55160043 removes the use of linkmode in the arm code.
The 386 and amd64 code needs to be fixed.
